mnd11:55.2: andubandhanena → addubandhanena (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), baddho → bandho (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mnd11:99.2: dukhañcāpi → dukhaṃ vāpi (bj) | dukkhaṃ vāpi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd11:99.4: jāniyāmāti → jānissāma iti (bj) | jānissāmāti (si, mr) | jāniyāma iti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd11:100.2: vibhāvīyati atikkamīyati samatikkamīyati → vibhāviyyati atikkamiyyati samatikkamiyyati (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vibhaviyyati atikkamiyyati samatikkamiyyati (cck)
